title: Pom Poko
alternative_title: Heisei Tanuki Gassen Ponpoko, 平成狸合戦ぽんぽこ
description: In Pom Poko (the Japanese title literally means Heisei-era Raccoon War Pom Poko), Tanuki living in the forest near a government construction project, are being threatened by the destruction of their habitat. Banding together and seeking help from other tribes of Tanuki, they live up to their traditionally mischievous reputation by changing their shape and trying to sabotage the construction effort.When this fails, they stage one last great illusion, hoping to alert the city folk to the natural wonders being bulldozed to make room for yet another Tokyo suburb, before it's too late...
